events.message: Customer reported a car accident that happened on February 9th involving rear-end collision at a traffic light.
The claim was categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing initial details related to the vehicle collision.
Assigned an agent specialized in auto claims to handle the customer's case for efficient processing.
Acknowledged receipt of claim and informed the customer regarding the next steps in the investigation process.
Requested police report, photos of the vehicle damage, and any witness statements from the customer.
Customer promptly submitted all requested documents including the police report and vehicle photos.
Investigation team began a detailed review of the accident circumstances and assessed damage to the vehicle.
Completed the investigation confirming liability and verifying the extent of damages to the insured vehicle.
Proposed a settlement amount to the customer covering repair costs and a rental car during vehicle repairs.
Received positive feedback from the customer appreciating the prompt proposal of settlement and support.
Claim was formally approved for the proposed settlement amount after final evaluation.
Processed and issued payment to the customerâ€™s account for the approved claim settlement promptly.
Claim successfully closed following final payment and confirmation that repairs were completed satisfactorily.
Archived all claim documents and case notes securely for future reference and compliance purposes.
